page.title: 20INFORMATION SYSTEMS
page.content:
The school,village hall and Post Office have notice boards outside for publicising local events.The Parish Council have two special notice boards for their needs. A free village newsletter is distributed to every house in the village approximately every 6 weeks.It publicises local events and church services. A mobile library from Downham Market comes through the village once a month.
{CREDITS {Mary Armstrong,Jenny Bunyan,Joan Card, {Joanna Cartwright,Hilda Crisp,Ann King {Nigel Nickles,Rita Nickles, {Michael Parfitt.
